Package com.limelion.logger

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.limelion.logger.Logger
  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    A highly customizable logging utility. See Builder for customization options and basic instantiation.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    LimelioN/LimeiloN <memorial.limelion@gmail.com>
    See Also:
    Builder

      static class  Logger.LogLevel
      All possible log levels

    • Constructor Detail

      • Logger

        public Logger​(com.limelion.logger.Builder b)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize a new Logger using a Builder object. Similar as calling Builder.build().
        Parameters:
        b - the builder
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • Logger

        public Logger​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String header,
              boolean doPrintLineHeading,
              boolean doPrintTime,
              boolean doPrintName,
              boolean doPrintDebug,
              boolean doPrintErr,
              boolean doPrintInfo,
              boolean doPrintToConsole,
              boolean doPrintToFile,
              java.lang.String baseLogFileName)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Create a new Logger by specifying all the parameters (very long, you may prefer to use the builder)
        Parameters:
        name - the text printed in brackets in the line heading
        header - the text printed at the start of the logger
        doPrintLineHeading - define if this logger should print the line heading
        doPrintTime - define if this logger should print out the current time in the line heading
        doPrintName - define if this logger should print out the name in the line heading
        doPrintDebug - define if this logger should print out debug messages
        doPrintErr - define if this logger should print out error messages
        doPrintInfo - define if this logger should print out info messages
        doPrintToConsole - define if this logger should print to console
        doPrintToFile - define if this logger should print to file
        baseLogFileName - name of the log file (may contains an extension - default to '.log')
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        Since:
        1.0

        public void log​(java.lang.String text,

                java.lang.Object... args)

        Parameters:

        level - LogLevel, the level to use
        args - Object..., arguments to parse possible placeholders
